sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include">
    <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <access>public</access>
        <active>true</active>
        <api_name>global.PADGCFCollector</api_name>
        <caller_access/>
        <client_callable>false</client_callable>
        <description>Log GCF metrics for Process Automation Designer</description>
        <name>PADGCFCollector</name>
        <script><![CDATA[var PADGCFCollector = Class.create();
PADGCFCollector.prototype = {
    initialize: function() {},
    processEvents: {
        PROCESS_CREATED: 'process_created',
    },
    validateProcessEvent: function(processEvent) {
        for (var key in this.processEvents) {
            if (this.processEvents[key] === processEvent)
                return true;
        }
        return false;
    },
    recordProcessUsageEvent: function(processEvent, processValue) {
        if (this.validateProcessEvent(processEvent)) {
            var sm = new GCFSampleMap();
            sm.put('process_key', processValue);
            GCFCollector.recordUsageEvent('process_automation_usage', 'snc.usage.process_automation', processEvent, sm);
        }
    },
    type: 'PADGCFCollector'
};]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2023-10-03 14:29:46</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>48e303934f213110cda744a058c71449</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>28</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>PADGCFCollector</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="Process Automation Designer Core - Model" source="com.glide.pad.core.model">0ae817db47220210cd4e1ce4316d431f</sys_package>
        <sys_policy>read</sys_policy>
        <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_include_48e303934f213110cda744a058c71449</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2023-10-25 05:05:53</sys_updated_on>
    </sys_script_include>
</record_update>
